## Monte carlo estimation

```{r}

mc_option_price <- function(t,T_,sigma,r,x,N) {
  X <- c()
  for (i in 1:N) {
    Z_i <- rnorm(1)
    X[i] <- x * exp((r-sigma^2/2)*(T_ - t) + sigma * sqrt(T_ - t) * Z_i)
  }
  F_ <- exp(-r*(T_ - t)) * 1/N * sum(X^2)
  return(F_)
}

mc_option_price(t,T_,sigma,r,x,10000)


```
